project_abstract.cdata: The main objectives of the Yangzhou Thermal Power Project are to: (a) support power subsector reforms at the provincial level, through development of Jiangsu Provincial Electric Power Company (JPEPC) as an autonomous company; (b) contribute to further rationalization of power tariffs; (c) promote the use of modern financial management techniques in transforming JPEPC's accounting system; (d) provide cost-effective and environmentally sustainable generation capacity to alleviate an acute shortage of power and improve the quality of the power supply; (e) assist in transferring modern technologies for large coal-fired power plants, and in strengthening institutional capabilities for environmental management and monitoring; and (f) extend technical assistance in management development and staff training program. The project consists of: (a) construction of a coal-fired thermal power plant with two 600-MW generating units and associated equipment; (b) erection of two 500-kV transmission lines (about 30 km long) and reinforcement of the existing power transmission network; (c) provision of engineering and construction management services; (d) extension of technical assistance for the development and implementation of improved accounting and financial management information systems; (e) carrying out of environmental management and resettlement programs; and (f) undertaking of management development and staff training.

P003641.projectinfo: <![CDATA[<Project><LangCode>ZH</LangCode><ProjectName>扬州火力发电项目</ProjectName><ProjectAbstract>本项目的主要目标是：（1）将江苏省电力公司改制为具有独立法人地位的公，支持省级电力行业改革；（2）促进电价进一步合理化；（3）推动使用现代化财务管理方法，改革江苏省电力公司会计制度；（4）建立具有成本效益和环境可持续性的发电能力，缓解电力紧缺状况，提高供电质量；（5）协助向大型燃煤电厂转让现代化技术，协助加强环境管理和监测方面的机构能力；（6）就管理人员培养和人员培训提供技术援助。项目具体内容包括：（1）新建装有两台500千伏发电机组和配套设备的燃煤电厂；（2）架设两条500千伏输电线路（总长约为30公里），加固现有输电网；（3）提供工程和施工管理服务；（4）提供技术援助，用于建立并运行改进后的会计和财务管理信息系统；（5）实施环境管理计划和移民计划；（6）开展管理人员培养和人员培训。</ProjectAbstract></Project>]]>
